name: Latitude
description: Latitude is an open-source platform for AI prompt engineering, deployment, and evaluation that helps teams build, test, and maintain reliable AI applications by providing a complete lifecycle management system for prompts.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of multiple services but has good Docker support and documentation.

name: Aptabase
description: Aptabase is an open-source alternative to Firebase/Google Analytics, specifically built for Mobile, Desktop and Web apps with a focus on privacy and simplicity.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker Compose with minimal configuration required.

name: AWStats
description: AWStats is a powerful, full-featured web server logfile analyzer that shows detailed web statistics including visitors, pages, hits, search engines, keywords, and more.

deployment.justification: Requires web server configuration and Perl setup. Some technical knowledge needed for proper configuration.

name: Apache Druid
description: Apache Druid is a high performance, real-time analytics database that delivers sub-second OLAP queries on streaming and batch data at scale and under load.

deployment.justification: Requires configuration of multiple components and understanding of architecture. Docker deployment available but setup needed for production use.

name: Enterprise Data Analytics
description: EDA is an open-source analytics and business intelligence platform focused on simplicity and ease of use, allowing users to create dashboards and reports without technical knowledge.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker with minimal configuration required. One-click deploy options available.

name: GoatCounter
description: GoatCounter is an open source web analytics platform available as a hosted service or self-hosted app. It aims to offer easy to use and meaningful privacy-friendly web analytics as an alternative to Google Analytics or Matomo.

deployment.justification: Single binary deployment with minimal configuration required. Supports both SQLite and PostgreSQL databases.

name: Litlyx
description: Litlyx is a modern, developer-friendly, cookie-free analytics tool that provides powerful web analytics capabilities. It offers a simple setup process and can be self-hosted with Docker as an alternative to Google Analytics, Matomo, and other analytics platforms.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker with minimal configuration required. Cloud version available with 30-second setup.

name: Liwan
description: Liwan is a lightweight, privacy-first web analytics platform written in Rust. It provides accurate real-time analytics with a single self-contained binary and no database requirements.

deployment.justification: Single binary deployment with no database required. Simple tracking script integration.

name: Matomo
description: Matomo (formerly Piwik) is a leading open source web analytics platform that gives you complete control over your data. It's a privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics with comprehensive tracking and reporting capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP and MySQL setup. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for production use.

name: Metabase
description: Metabase is an easy-to-use, open source business intelligence and analytics platform that lets anyone in your organization ask questions and learn from data through a simple interface.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker with minimal configuration required. Cloud version available for instant setup.

name: Middleware
description: Middleware is an open-source tool designed to help engineering leaders measure and analyze the effectiveness of their teams using the DORA metrics.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker with minimal configuration required.

name: Mixpost
description: Mixpost is a self-hosted social media management platform that allows you to schedule, publish, and manage social media content. It provides features like analytics, team collaboration, media library management, and post templating without subscriptions or limits.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP and database setup. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for production use.

name: Offen
description: Offen is a privacy-focused web analytics platform that gives users full access to their data while providing website operators with essential insights. It's lightweight, self-hosted, and emphasizes transparency and user consent.

deployment.justification: Single binary deployment with automatic SSL certificate management. Docker deployment also available.

name: Plausible Analytics
description: Plausible Analytics is a lightweight, open-source and privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics. It doesn't use cookies, is fully compliant with GDPR/CCPA/PECR, and can be self-hosted or cloud-hosted.

deployment.justification: Requires Elixir/PostgreSQL/ClickHouse setup. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for production use.

name: PostHog
description: PostHog is an all-in-one open source product analytics platform that provides analytics, session recording, feature flags, A/B testing, surveys and more. It can be self-hosted or used as a cloud service.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup and configuration. Cloud version available for easier deployment.

name: Redash
description: Redash is an open source business intelligence and data visualization platform that enables anyone to query, visualize and share data from any data source. It supports multiple databases and provides interactive dashboards, scheduled reports and alerts.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup and configuration. Cloud version available for easier deployment.

name: RudderStack
description: RudderStack is an open source Customer Data Platform (CDP) that provides data pipelines to collect data from applications, websites and SaaS platforms, then activate it in your warehouse and business tools.

deployment.justification: Requires PostgreSQL database setup and configuration. Docker and Kubernetes deployments available but need proper setup for production use.

name: Shynet
description: Shynet is a modern, privacy-friendly and cookie-free web analytics platform that provides detailed insights without compromising visitor privacy. It works without JavaScript and can be self-hosted.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker or Kubernetes setup with database configuration. Multiple deployment options available but needs proper setup.

name: Snowflake
description: Snowflake is a cloud-based data warehousing platform that enables data storage, processing, and analytics at scale. It provides a fully managed service with features like data sharing, time travel, and automatic scaling.

name: Apache Superset
description: Apache Superset is a modern, enterprise-ready business intelligence web application that enables data exploration and visualization through an intuitive interface. It supports a wide range of databases and provides powerful SQL querying capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires Python/database setup and configuration. Docker deployment available but needs proper setup for production use.

name: Umami
description: Umami is a simple, fast, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics. It provides website analytics with a clean interface and without compromising visitor privacy.

deployment.justification: Simple setup with Docker or Node.js. Supports multiple databases and provides clear documentation.

name: ArchiveBox
description: ArchiveBox is a self-hosted web archiving solution that lets you preserve content from websites in multiple formats like HTML, PDF, screenshots, and more. It supports importing from browser history, bookmarks, RSS feeds, and other sources.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of dependencies like Chrome and yt-dlp. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for production use.

name: ArchivesSpace
description: ArchivesSpace is an open source archives information management system built for managing and providing web access to archives, manuscripts and digital objects.

deployment.justification: Requires Ruby/Java environment setup and database configuration. Docker deployment available but setup can be complex.

name: BitMagnet
description: BitMagnet is a self-hosted BitTorrent indexer, DHT crawler, and content classifier with a modern web UI, GraphQL API and seamless integration with the Servarr stack.

deployment.justification: Requires database setup and Go environment. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for optimal performance.

name: CKAN
description: CKAN is an open source data management system that makes it easy to publish, share and work with data. It powers many government and organizational data portals with features for cataloging, storing and accessing datasets.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup and database configuration. Docker deployment available but setup needed for production use.

name: Omeka S
description: Omeka S is a web publication system for universities, galleries, libraries, archives, and museums. It enables creating networks of independently curated exhibits sharing collaborative pools of items, media, and metadata.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP/MySQL environment setup and Apache configuration. Docker deployment available but setup needed for production use.

name: wallabag
description: wallabag is a self-hosted web application for saving web pages to read later. It extracts and stores content without distractions like ads, allowing offline reading across devices.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP/MySQL environment setup and configuration. Docker deployment available but setup needed for production use.

name: Wayback
description: An archiving tool with an IM-style interface that prioritizes privacy and accessibility, integrated with various archival services including Internet Archive, archive.today, Ghostarchive, IPFS, Telegraph, and file systems.

deployment.justification: Requires Go environment setup and configuration. Docker deployment available but setup needed for production use.

name: Authelia
description: Authelia is an open-source authentication and authorization server providing two-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal. It acts as a companion for reverse proxies.

deployment.justification: Requires configuration of reverse proxy and understanding of authentication concepts.

name: Authentik
description: Authentik is an open-source Identity Provider focused on flexibility and versatility. It supports multiple authentication protocols and can serve as a self-hosted alternative to commercial solutions like Okta, Auth0, and Entra ID.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of identity concepts but has good documentation and Docker Compose support for smaller deployments.

name: Casdoor
description: Casdoor is an open-source Identity and Access Management (IAM) / Single-Sign-On (SSO) platform with a web UI supporting multiple authentication protocols including OAuth 2.0, OIDC, SAML, CAS, LDAP, SCIM, WebAuthn, and more.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of identity concepts but has good documentation and Docker support for easier deployment.

name: FusionAuth
description: FusionAuth is a modern customer identity and access management (CIAM) platform that provides authentication, authorization, and user management capabilities. It offers flexible deployment options including self-hosted and cloud-hosted solutions.

deployment.justification: Offers multiple deployment options with good documentation, but requires understanding of identity concepts.

name: Keycloak
description: Keycloak is an open source identity and access management solution providing features like single sign-on, identity brokering and social login, user federation, strong authentication, and fine-grained authorization.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of identity concepts and configuration, but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Logto
description: Logto is a modern, open-source authentication infrastructure focused on SaaS and AI applications. It provides multi-tenancy, enterprise SSO, and RBAC capabilities while simplifying OIDC and OAuth 2.1 implementation.

deployment.justification: Offers multiple deployment options including Docker Compose and Node.js, requires understanding of auth concepts.

name: Pocket ID
description: Pocket ID is a simple OIDC provider focused on passkey authentication, allowing users to securely access services without passwords. It provides a streamlined alternative to more complex identity providers.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker with good documentation and minimal configuration needed.

name: ZITADEL
description: ZITADEL is an open-source identity and access management platform with built-in multi-tenancy, providing authentication, authorization, and user management capabilities. It offers both self-hosted and cloud options with features like SSO, OIDC, SAML, and passkey support.

deployment.justification: Offers multiple deployment options with good documentation, but requires understanding of identity concepts and infrastructure setup.

name: Activepieces
description: Activepieces is an open source alternative to Zapier, providing AI-powered workflow automation with a type-safe pieces framework written in TypeScript.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js environment and database setup. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for advanced features.

name: Apache Airflow
description: Apache Airflow is a platform to programmatically author, schedule, and monitor workflows. When workflows are defined as code, they become more maintainable, versionable, testable, and collaborative.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup and database configuration. Docker deployment available but needs proper configuration for production use.

name: Automatisch
description: Automatisch is an open source business automation tool that lets you connect different services like Twitter, Slack, and more to automate business processes without any programming knowledge.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker environment setup. Configuration needed for production use.

name: Beehive
description: Beehive is an event and agent system that allows you to create automated tasks triggered by events and filters. It provides a modular architecture with support for Twitter, Email, IRC, RSS and many other integrations.

deployment.justification: Requires Go environment setup and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: ChangeDetection
description: An open source website change detection, monitoring and notification service. Monitor webpages for changes including text content, visual changes, price drops and more.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker Compose with minimal configuration required.

name: ChiefOnboarding
description: ChiefOnboarding is a free and open source employee onboarding platform that lets you onboard new hires through Slack or a web dashboard with automated provisioning, pre-boarding, and structured onboarding sequences.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker or Python environment setup. Configuration needed for production use.

name: Dittofeed
description: Dittofeed is an open source customer engagement platform for automating transactional and marketing messages across email, SMS, mobile push, WhatsApp, Slack and other channels.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup and configuration of messaging providers.

name: Flowise
description: Flowise is an open-source no-code platform for building AI agents and workflows visually, with support for LangChain, multiple LLM integrations, and customizable components.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js environment and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed including UI, server and database.

name: Healthchecks
description: Healthchecks is an open source cron job monitoring service that listens for HTTP requests and email messages from your scheduled tasks and sends alerts when jobs don't check in on time.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup and database configuration. Multiple processes need to be managed.

name: HRConvert2
description: HRConvert2 is a self-hosted file conversion server and sharing tool that supports 445 file formats with drag-and-drop functionality, OCR capabilities, virus scanning, and multiple language support.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP server setup and configuration of various conversion tools.

name: Huginn
description: Huginn is an open source system for building agents that perform automated tasks online. It can monitor websites, watch for events, and take actions on your behalf through a directed graph of agents.

deployment.justification: Requires Ruby environment setup and database configuration. Multiple processes need to be managed.

name: Kestra
description: Kestra is an open source event-driven orchestration platform that makes both scheduled and event-driven workflows easy through a declarative YAML interface and intuitive UI.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: Leon
description: Leon is an open source personal assistant that can live on your server. It provides a customizable skill system, offline speech capabilities, and privacy-focused automation through both voice and text interfaces.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js environment setup and configuration of various components like speech recognition.

name: Mylar3
description: Mylar3 is an automated Comic Book (cbr/cbz) downloader program that monitors and downloads comics from NZB and torrent sources, with support for story arcs, metadata tagging, and library management.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup and configuration of download clients. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: n8n
description: n8n is a fair-code workflow automation platform that combines visual building with custom code capabilities, offering 400+ integrations, native AI features, and flexible deployment options.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js environment setup and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: Node-RED
description: Node-RED is a low-code programming tool for event-driven applications that enables you to wire together hardware devices, APIs and online services using a visual flow-based development environment.

deployment.justification: Simple installation via npm with minimal configuration required.

name: OliveTin
description: OliveTin provides a simple web interface for executing predefined shell commands safely, making it easy to give non-technical users and admins controlled access to system operations.

deployment.justification: Simple installation via package managers or containers with straightforward YAML configuration.

name: Prefect
description: Prefect is a modern workflow orchestration framework for Python that enables data teams to build, schedule and monitor resilient data pipelines with features like retries, caching, and event-based automation.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup and understanding of workflow concepts. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for production use.

name: pyLoad
description: pyLoad is a free and open source download manager written in Python that supports multiple file hosts, download automation, and a web interface for remote management.

deployment.justification: Simple installation via pip or Docker with straightforward configuration.

name: Typebot
description: Typebot is an open-source conversational app builder that allows you to create advanced chatbots and forms visually, offering a powerful alternative to Typeform or Landbot.

deployment.justification: Docker-based deployment with clear documentation and minimal configuration required.

name: µTask
description: µTask is a powerful automation engine that allows you to model and execute business processes using YAML templates, providing secure data encryption, access control, and extensibility through custom Golang plugins.

deployment.justification: Requires Postgres database setup and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: WilmerAI
description: WilmerAI is an open source LLM routing and workflow automation platform that enables prompts to be routed to specialized workflows and allows multiple LLMs to work together to generate responses.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: Windmill
description: Windmill is an open-source developer platform for building internal tools, automating tasks, and creating workflows. It provides a unified interface for APIs, background jobs, and UIs with support for multiple programming languages.

deployment.justification: Requires Postgres database setup and configuration. Multiple components need to be managed.

name: WBO (Whitebophir)
description: WBO is a web-based collaborative whiteboard that allows teams to draw, write, and brainstorm together in real-time on shared boards without requiring any installation.

deployment.justification: Simple Node.js application with Docker support, minimal dependencies and configuration.

name: AnyCable
description: AnyCable is a realtime server for two-way reliable communication over WebSockets and SSE. It provides a scalable and performant solution for adding realtime features to any backend application.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of multiple services but has good Docker support and documentation.

name: Apprise
description: Apprise allows you to send notifications to almost all of the most popular notification services available today such as: Telegram, Discord, Slack, Amazon SNS, Gotify, etc. through a single unified interface.

deployment.justification: Simple Python package installation with good documentation and CLI support.

name: Centrifugo
description: Centrifugo is an open-source scalable real-time messaging server that can instantly deliver messages to application users over WebSocket, HTTP-streaming, SSE, GRPC, and WebTransport. It provides a language-agnostic PUB/SUB server for building real-time applications.

deployment.justification: Requires configuration but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Chitchatter
description: Chitchatter is a free, peer-to-peer, end-to-end encrypted communication tool designed for private and secure messaging. It offers serverless, decentralized, and ephemeral chat with features like video calls, screen sharing, and file transfers.

deployment.justification: Static site that can be deployed to any web host with minimal configuration.

name: Databag
description: Databag is a federated messenger for self-hosting that focuses on efficiency and minimal resource usage. It provides decentralized communication with end-to-end encryption, audio/video calls, and topic-based threading.

deployment.justification: Requires DNS setup but has good Docker and container support with documentation.

name: Element
description: Element is a secure and decentralized communication client for the Matrix network. It provides end-to-end encrypted messaging, voice/video calls, file sharing, and collaboration features with a focus on privacy and security.

deployment.justification: Requires Matrix homeserver setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: GlobaLeaks
description: GlobaLeaks is a free and open-source whistleblowing software enabling anyone to easily set up and maintain a secure reporting platform. It provides end-to-end encryption, anonymity features, and comprehensive security measures.

deployment.justification: Requires server setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Gotify
description: Gotify is a simple server for sending and receiving messages in real-time via WebSocket. It provides a sleek web UI, REST API, and supports plugins for extending functionality. Perfect for self-hosted push notifications.

deployment.justification: Simple setup with good documentation and Docker support.

name: Live Helper Chat
description: Live Helper Chat is an open-source live support application that enables real-time customer support through web chat. It features a comprehensive set of tools including chatbots, voice/video calls, mobile apps, and integrations with popular messaging platforms.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Mattermost
description: Mattermost is an open source platform for secure collaboration across the entire software development lifecycle. It provides team messaging, file sharing, project management and integrations in a self-hosted environment.

deployment.justification: Requires database setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Mumble
description: Mumble is an open-source, low-latency and high-quality voice chat program built on Qt and Opus. It provides secure, encrypted communication through a client-server architecture with excellent audio quality and minimal delay.

deployment.justification: Requires server setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Novu
description: Novu is an open-source notification infrastructure that provides a unified API for sending notifications across multiple channels including Email, SMS, Push, and Chat. It offers an embeddable notification center, workflow engine, and no-code email editor.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of multiple services but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: PushBits
description: PushBits is an open-source relay server for push notifications that delivers important notifications through Matrix, offering a self-hosted alternative to Pushover and Gotify without requiring an additional app.

deployment.justification: Single Go binary with PostgreSQL/SQLite backend, Docker support, and straightforward configuration.

name: RetroShare
description: RetroShare is a decentralized, encrypted, peer-to-peer communication platform that creates a network of trust between friends, offering secure file sharing, chat, forums, channels, and mail without relying on central servers.

deployment.justification: Desktop applications available for all major platforms with simple installation, no server setup required.

name: Revolt
description: Revolt is an open-source, self-hostable chat platform designed as a privacy-focused alternative to Discord, featuring text/voice channels, customizable servers, and a familiar user interface without compromising on user privacy.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker Compose setup with multiple services including MongoDB, Redis, and various microservices.

name: Rocket.Chat
description: Rocket.Chat is an open-source, fully customizable communications platform for organizations with high standards of data protection, offering team collaboration, omnichannel customer service, and a complete messaging solution.

deployment.justification: Requires MongoDB and Node.js setup, but offers Docker deployment and comprehensive documentation.

name: SAMA
description: SAMA is a next-generation self-hosted chat server and clients platform that provides modern messaging capabilities with complete control over your data and infrastructure.

deployment.justification: Docker-based deployment with Node.js, straightforward setup process.

name: Screego
description: Screego is a simple, secure tool to quickly share your screen with one or multiple people via web browser, requiring no installation or registration.

deployment.justification: Single Docker container or Go binary, minimal configuration required.

name: SimpleX Chat
description: SimpleX Chat is the most private and secure messaging platform with no user identifiers, featuring double ratchet E2E encryption and a unique approach to privacy that doesn't require phone numbers or usernames.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of the SimpleX protocol and server setup, but provides Docker images.

name: Spectrum 2
description: Spectrum 2 is an open-source instant messaging transport that bridges different IM networks, allowing users to communicate across platforms like XMPP, Discord, Telegram, and more.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of XMPP protocols and complex configuration for different transports.

name: Synapse
description: Synapse is the reference homeserver implementation for Matrix, an open standard for secure, decentralized, real-time communication across different service providers.

deployment.justification: Requires PostgreSQL setup and understanding of Matrix federation, but has excellent documentation.

name: Syndie
description: Syndie is a libre system for operating distributed forums, providing anonymous and secure communication through encrypted, decentralized message syndication.

deployment.justification: Java application requiring understanding of distributed systems and anonymity networks.

name: Tailchat
description: Tailchat is a next-generation noIM application for your workspace, designed to be more than just another Slack/Discord clone with its plugin system and modern architecture.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker/Kubernetes setup with MongoDB and Redis, but provides good documentation.

name: Tiledesk
description: Tiledesk is an all-in-one customer engagement platform offering omnichannel live chat, AI-powered chatbots, and comprehensive support tools from lead generation to post-sales.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup with MongoDB and various microservices, but provides comprehensive documentation.

name: Tinode
description: Tinode is an instant messaging platform with a Go backend and clients for iOS, Android, web, and command line, designed for building chat applications with modern features.

deployment.justification: Requires Go backend setup with database configuration, but provides Docker images and clear documentation.

name: Tox
description: Tox is a distributed, secure messenger with audio and video chat capabilities, providing peer-to-peer encrypted communication without central servers.

deployment.justification: Client applications available for all platforms, no server setup required as it's P2P.

name: Zulip
description: Zulip is a powerful open-source team chat application that combines the immediacy of real-time chat with the organization of email-style threading, designed for productive team collaboration.

deployment.justification: Requires PostgreSQL and Redis setup, but provides excellent documentation and installation scripts.

name: Atomic CRM
description: Atomic CRM is a full-featured open-source CRM built with React, react-admin, and Supabase, offering contact management, task tracking, email integration, deal pipeline visualization and extensive customization capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js and Docker setup but has good documentation and installation guides.

name: Corteza
description: Corteza is an open source low-code platform that enables building CRM, business process and structured data applications with workflow automation capabilities and extensive integration options.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of low-code concepts and configuration, but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Django-CRM
description: Django-CRM is an open-source CRM solution built on Django framework, providing enterprise-level features like lead management, task tracking, email marketing, and sales analytics while maintaining simplicity in development and customization.

deployment.justification: Requires Django/Python knowledge but has good documentation and follows standard Django patterns.

name: Dolibarr
description: Dolibarr ERP & CRM is a modern open source software package that helps manage business activities like contacts, invoices, orders, stocks, calendar, HR and more. It's designed for small to large companies and can be used standalone or as a web application.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup and database configuration, but has good documentation and installer wizard.

name: ERPNext
description: ERPNext is a comprehensive, free, and open-source Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system that includes CRM, accounting, HR, manufacturing and more. It provides a complete business management solution used by thousands of companies worldwide.

deployment.justification: Complex ERP system requiring technical expertise for deployment, configuration and maintenance.

name: EspoCRM
description: EspoCRM is an open-source CRM platform designed to help organizations build and maintain strong customer relationships, providing tools for managing leads, contacts, sales opportunities, marketing campaigns, and support cases.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP/MySQL setup but has good documentation and multiple installation options.

name: Ever Gauzy
description: Ever Gauzy is an open-source business management platform that combines ERP, CRM, HRM, and project management capabilities. It offers features like time tracking, employee management, project tracking, and financial management tools.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of multiple components including PostgreSQL, Redis, and optional services. Docker/Kubernetes deployment recommended for production.

name: Krayin CRM
description: Krayin CRM is an open-source Laravel-based CRM framework designed for SMEs and enterprises, offering complete customer lifecycle management with features like lead generation, custom attributes, and email integration.

deployment.justification: Requires Laravel/PHP knowledge but has good documentation and installation guides.

name: Monica
description: Monica is an open-source personal relationship management system (PRM) that helps you document your life and organize interactions with family and friends, offering features like contact management, reminders, diary entries, and document storage.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP/Laravel setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Odoo
description: Odoo is a comprehensive suite of open source business applications including CRM, Website Builder, eCommerce, Project Management, Accounting, Point of Sale, HR and more. The apps can be used standalone or integrated into a complete ERP system.

deployment.justification: Complex system with many components requiring significant technical expertise to deploy and maintain.

name: SuiteCRM
description: SuiteCRM is an award-winning open-source enterprise CRM platform that provides comprehensive customer relationship management capabilities including sales automation, marketing campaigns, support cases, project management and more.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP/MySQL setup but has good documentation and multiple installation options.

name: Twenty
description: Twenty is a modern, open-source CRM platform focused on providing a fresh user experience with features like customer tracking, opportunity management, and task automation while maintaining complete data ownership.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of TypeScript/React/Node.js but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Cloud Bigtable
description: Cloud Bigtable is Google's fully managed, scalable NoSQL database service designed for large analytical and operational workloads. It powers many Google services including Search, Analytics, Maps and Gmail.

name: ClickHouse
description: ClickHouse is an open-source column-oriented database management system that allows generating analytical data reports in real-time. It provides high performance for analytical queries on large datasets.

deployment.justification: Requires careful configuration and tuning for optimal performance. Complex distributed architecture needs expertise to manage effectively.

name: Apache HBase
description: Apache HBase is an open-source, distributed, versioned, column-oriented database modeled after Google's Bigtable. It provides Bigtable-like capabilities on top of Apache Hadoop for handling massive datasets with billions of rows and millions of columns.

deployment.justification: Requires Hadoop ecosystem knowledge and careful configuration for production deployments. Complex architecture with multiple components to manage.

name: ScyllaDB
description: ScyllaDB is a high-performance NoSQL database that is API-compatible with Apache Cassandra and Amazon DynamoDB. It uses a shared-nothing approach to increase throughput and storage capacity, delivering order-of-magnitude performance improvements.

deployment.justification: Requires careful configuration and tuning for optimal performance. Complex distributed architecture needs expertise to manage effectively.

name: Adminer
description: Adminer is a full-featured database management tool written in PHP. It consists of a single file ready to deploy to the target server and supports multiple database systems including MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and more.

deployment.justification: Single PHP file deployment, just upload and run. Requires PHP environment.

name: Azimutt
description: Azimutt is a next-generation ERD tool for exploring, documenting and analyzing database schemas. It provides modern visualization capabilities for handling large, complex database structures with features for schema design, data exploration, documentation and analysis.

deployment.justification: Docker image available but requires configuration of storage and email services.

name: Baserow
description: Baserow is an open-source no-code database tool and Airtable alternative that allows users to create online databases without technical experience. It combines spreadsheet ease-of-use with powerful data organization capabilities.

deployment.justification: Docker deployment available but requires configuration of storage and services.

name: Bytebase
description: Bytebase is a Database CI/CD and DevSecOps solution that helps teams manage database changes, access control, and governance. It provides a web-based interface for developers and DBAs to collaborate on database development lifecycle management.

deployment.justification: Docker and Kubernetes deployment options available with good documentation.

name: Chartbrew
description: Chartbrew is an open-source web platform for creating live reporting dashboards by connecting directly to databases and APIs. It provides a chart builder, editable dashboards, embeddable charts, query editor, and team collaboration features.

deployment.justification: Docker deployment available with detailed documentation, requires database and Redis setup.

name: ChartDB
description: ChartDB is an open-source web-based database diagramming editor that allows users to instantly visualize database schemas through a single "Smart Query". It provides AI-powered schema export, interactive editing, and supports multiple database systems.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with optional AI capabilities configuration.

name: CloudBeaver
description: CloudBeaver is a web-based database management tool that provides a rich interface for working with databases. Built on DBeaver's core, it offers database administration, query execution, and data visualization through a modern web interface.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with detailed documentation.

name: Databunker
description: Databunker is a self-hosted, GDPR compliant, secure database for storing personal records (PII/PHI/KYC). It provides encryption, tokenization, and privacy controls while offering a simple REST API for integration.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of database concepts and security practices, but provides good documentation and Docker deployment options.

name: Datasette
description: Datasette is a tool for exploring and publishing data. It helps people take data of any shape or size and publish that as an interactive, explorable website and accompanying API.

deployment.justification: Requires basic understanding of databases and Python, but provides good documentation and multiple deployment options.

name: Evidence
description: Evidence is an open-source business intelligence tool that generates interactive data visualizations and reports using SQL queries and markdown files. It offers a code-based alternative to traditional drag-and-drop BI tools.

deployment.justification: Requires knowledge of SQL and markdown, but provides good documentation and multiple deployment options including VSCode extension.

name: Mathesar
description: Mathesar is a web application that provides an intuitive spreadsheet-like interface for PostgreSQL databases, allowing users of all technical skill levels to view, edit, query, and collaborate on data directly. It's self-hosted and uses native Postgres access control.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker for installation but provides detailed documentation. Basic understanding of PostgreSQL helpful but not required.

name: NocoDB
description: NocoDB is an open source no-code platform that turns any database into a smart spreadsheet. It provides an Airtable-like interface with powerful features including role-based access control, REST APIs, and automation workflows.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker installation with good documentation and multiple deployment options including auto-upstall script.

features.name: Database Support
features.value: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQL Server, MariaDB

name: DSpace
description: DSpace is a turnkey institutional repository application that provides durable access to digital resources, widely used by academic, non-profit, and commercial organizations.

deployment.justification: Requires Java, PostgreSQL, and Solr setup with complex configuration for production use.

name: EPrints
description: EPrints is a flexible repository software developed for building high quality and high value repositories, primarily used by academic institutions for open access research outputs.

deployment.justification: Requires Perl, MySQL, and Apache setup with specific module configurations.

name: Fedora Commons Repository
description: Fedora is a robust, modular, open source repository system for the management and dissemination of digital content, particularly suited for digital libraries and archives.

deployment.justification: Complex architecture requiring Java, triple store, and understanding of linked data concepts.

name: InvenioRDM
description: InvenioRDM is a modern research data management repository platform that enables organizations to securely share and preserve research data with a beautiful, intuitive interface.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL, and Redis with complex initial setup.

name: Islandora
description: Islandora is an open-source software framework designed to help institutions collaboratively manage and discover digital assets using Drupal and Fedora Repository.

deployment.justification: Requires Drupal, Fedora Repository, Solr, and various microservices with complex integration.

name: Samvera Hyrax
description: Hyrax is a front-end application for the Samvera repository framework, providing a user interface for managing repository objects in Fedora-based digital repositories.

deployment.justification: Complex Ruby on Rails application requiring Fedora, Solr, Redis, and extensive configuration.

name: DocKing
description: DocKing is a document management service/microservice that handles templates and renders them in PDF format, providing a centralized solution for PDF generation and template management.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP environment and database setup. Docker deployment available but needs configuration for PDF engines and storage.

name: Docspell
description: Docspell is a personal document management system that helps organize files from scanners, emails and other sources, featuring machine learning powered metadata suggestions and OCR processing.

deployment.justification: Requires database setup and Java environment. Docker deployment available but configuration needed for advanced features.

name: Documenso
description: Documenso is an open-source document signing tool that enables secure digital signatures while maintaining privacy and control through self-hosting capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js and PostgreSQL setup. Docker deployment available with good documentation.

name: DocuSeal
description: DocuSeal is an open source document filling and signing platform that provides secure and efficient digital document processing, allowing users to create PDF forms that can be filled and signed online with an easy-to-use, mobile-optimized interface.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation and multiple hosting options

name: Evergreen
description: Evergreen is a highly-scalable integrated library system (ILS) software that helps library patrons find library materials and helps libraries manage, catalog, and circulate those materials. Designed for consortial use and large library systems.

deployment.justification: Complex enterprise system requiring PostgreSQL, specialized configuration, and library science knowledge.

name: EveryDocs
description: EveryDocs is a simple Document Management System (DMS) for private use, offering basic functionality to organize documents digitally with features like folder organization, full-text search, and encrypted storage.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker Compose deployment available with good documentation. Manual installation also possible but not recommended.

name: Gotenberg
description: Gotenberg is a containerized API that provides seamless PDF conversion capabilities, allowing developers to convert various document formats like HTML, Markdown, Word, and Excel into PDFs using tools like Chromium and LibreOffice.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with minimal configuration required

name: I, Librarian
description: I, Librarian is an open-source document management system focused on research and academic papers, featuring PDF management, metadata extraction, and integration with academic databases like PubMed, NASA, IEEE, and arXiv.

deployment.justification: Requires Apache and PHP setup. Installers available for Windows and Linux but manual configuration may be needed.

name: Koha
description: Koha is the world's first free and open-source integrated library system (ILS). It provides enterprise-class features including acquisitions, circulation, cataloging, label printing, offline circulation, and comprehensive patron management for libraries of all sizes.

deployment.justification: Well-documented with good community support, but requires LAMP stack setup and library-specific configuration.

name: Mayan EDMS
description: Mayan EDMS is an open-source document management system focused on storing, organizing and categorizing files while preserving business context, featuring OCR, previews, digital signatures, workflows, and a REST API.

deployment.justification: Docker deployment available but requires configuration. Hardware requirements include 2GB RAM and multi-core CPU.

name: OpenSign
description: OpenSign is an open-source document e-signing solution that provides a secure and reliable alternative to commercial e-signature platforms like DocuSign, offering features like secure PDF signing, multi-signer support, templates, and audit trails.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment using Docker with good documentation

name: Paperless-ngx
description: Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms physical documents into a searchable online archive. It provides OCR scanning, indexing, and archival features to help reduce paper storage while maintaining document accessibility.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has good documentation and installation script.

features.name: Target Use Case
features.value: Personal and small business document archival

name: Papermerge
description: Papermerge is an open-source document management system focused on scanned documents and digital archives, featuring OCR text extraction, full-text search, document versioning, and metadata management with a desktop-like web interface.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of Python environment and database. Docker deployment available but needs configuration.

name: PdfDing
description: PdfDing is a self-hosted PDF manager, viewer and editor offering seamless reading experience across devices, with features like multi-level tagging, annotations, highlighting, and progress tracking.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment using Docker with minimal configuration required

name: RERO ILS
description: RERO ILS is a large-scale integrated library system that can be run as a service with consortial features, intended primarily for library networks. It includes most standard modules (circulation, acquisitions, cataloging) and provides both web-based public and professional interfaces.

deployment.justification: Modern containerized system but requires Docker expertise, Elasticsearch, and complex configuration for consortial features.

name: Stirling PDF
description: Stirling PDF is a powerful open-source web-based PDF manipulation tool that enables secure local hosting and provides 50+ operations including splitting, merging, converting, and more.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with minimal configuration required. Enterprise features available for advanced setups.

name: Teedy
description: Teedy is a lightweight document management system for individuals and businesses, featuring OCR, full-text search, metadata management, workflow capabilities, and file versioning with a responsive interface.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment using Docker with minimal configuration required

name: Aimeos
description: Aimeos is a professional, full-featured and ultra-fast e-commerce framework for building custom online shops, market places and complex B2B applications scaling to billions of items with Laravel.

deployment.justification: Requires Laravel setup with database configuration and composer dependencies.

name: Bagisto
description: Bagisto is a leading Laravel open source e-commerce framework with multi-inventory sources, taxation, localization, dropshipping and more exciting features.

deployment.justification: Simple Laravel installation with built-in installer and clear documentation.

name: CoreShop
description: CoreShop is a comprehensive e-commerce plugin for Pimcore, providing a full-featured online shop solution integrated with Pimcore's powerful data management capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires Pimcore installation and understanding of Pimcore's architecture.

name: Drupal Commerce
description: Drupal Commerce is a popular e-commerce module for Drupal CMS, with support for dozens of payment, shipping, and shopping related modules, providing a flexible commerce solution.

deployment.justification: Requires Drupal installation and configuration of commerce modules.

name: EverShop
description: EverShop is a GraphQL-based and React e-commerce platform with essential commerce features, modular architecture, and full customization capabilities.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment or Node.js installation with built-in CLI.

name: Litecart
description: Litecart is a minimalist shopping cart solution in a single file, supporting both traditional card payments and cryptocurrency transactions with a focus on simplicity.

deployment.justification: Single binary or Docker container with minimal configuration required.

name: Magento Open Source
description: Magento Open Source is a leading provider of open omnichannel innovation, offering a flexible and scalable commerce platform trusted by thousands of merchants worldwide.

deployment.justification: Complex installation requiring specific server configuration, multiple services, and performance optimization.

name: MedusaJs
description: MedusaJs is a headless commerce engine that enables developers to create amazing digital commerce experiences with a modular architecture and powerful APIs.

deployment.justification: Simple npm installation or Docker deployment with clear documentation.

name: Microweber
description: Microweber is a drag and drop CMS and online shop that combines website building with e-commerce functionality in an easy-to-use platform.

deployment.justification: One-click installers available, simple PHP application with automated setup.

name: Open Source POS
description: Open Source Point of Sale is a web-based point of sale system designed for small to medium businesses, offering inventory management, sales tracking, and customer management.

deployment.justification: Standard PHP application with Docker support and straightforward installation.

name: OpenCart
description: OpenCart is a free, open-source shopping cart solution that provides a professional and reliable foundation for building a successful online store.

deployment.justification: Simple installation wizard, minimal server requirements, and extensive documentation.

name: PrestaShop
description: PrestaShop is a fully scalable open-source e-commerce solution that powers over 300,000 online stores worldwide with comprehensive features and a vibrant ecosystem.

deployment.justification: One-click installer, clear requirements, and automated setup process.

name: Pretix
description: Pretix is a ticket sales platform for events that provides a comprehensive solution for selling tickets online and at the door with a focus on data privacy and flexibility.

deployment.justification: Requires Python environment setup with PostgreSQL and Redis for production use.

name: s-cart
description: S-Cart is a free e-commerce website project for individuals and businesses, built on top of Laravel Framework with a modern, clean design and comprehensive features.

deployment.justification: Standard Laravel application with automated installer and clear documentation.

name: Saleor
description: Saleor is a high-performance, Django-based, GraphQL-first e-commerce platform that delivers ultra-fast, dynamic, and personalized shopping experiences.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup with PostgreSQL, Redis, and proper configuration for production.

name: Shopware Community Edition
description: Shopware is a trendsetting open source e-commerce platform made in Germany, offering a perfect balance between innovation, flexibility, and ease of use.

deployment.justification: Requires Symfony knowledge and specific server configuration for optimal performance.

name: Solidus
description: Solidus is a free, open-source ecommerce platform built with Ruby on Rails that gives you complete control over your store with a focus on flexibility and customization.

deployment.justification: Requires Ruby on Rails environment setup with PostgreSQL and Redis.

name: Spree Commerce
description: Spree is a complete, modular & API-driven open source e-commerce solution for Ruby on Rails, offering a flexible platform for building sophisticated online stores.

deployment.justification: Requires Ruby on Rails environment with PostgreSQL and proper gem configuration.

name: Sylius
description: Sylius is a Symfony-powered open source full-stack platform for eCommerce, built on solid foundations with a focus on customization and professional support.

deployment.justification: Requires Symfony expertise and proper server configuration for production deployment.

name: Thelia
description: Thelia is an open source and flexible e-commerce solution based on Symfony components, offering a modern approach to building online stores with a focus on modularity.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP environment with Symfony knowledge and database configuration.

name: Vendure
description: Vendure is a headless commerce framework built with TypeScript and Node.js, designed to deliver ultra-fast, scalable, and customizable e-commerce experiences.

deployment.justification: Simple npm installation with TypeScript, includes CLI tools for quick setup.

name: WooCommerce
description: WooCommerce is the world's most popular open-source e-commerce solution, built as a WordPress plugin to transform any WordPress site into a fully functional online store.

deployment.justification: Simple WordPress plugin installation with extensive documentation and one-click setup.

name: Keila
description: Keila is an open source newsletter tool and Mailchimp alternative that allows you to easily send campaigns and create sign-up forms, with support for multiple email delivery providers.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker with example configurations provided.

name: Listmonk
description: Listmonk is a high-performance, self-hosted newsletter and mailing list manager with a modern dashboard interface. It's distributed as a single binary and uses PostgreSQL for data storage.

deployment.justification: Simple deployment via Docker or single binary with PostgreSQL database.

name: Mautic
description: Mautic is an open source marketing automation platform that helps businesses automate their marketing campaigns, track leads, send emails, and manage customer relationships through a modern web interface.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup with PHP and database, but has detailed documentation and Docker option available.

name: phpList
description: Fully functional open source email marketing manager for creating, sending, integrating, and analyzing email campaigns and newsletters. Used in 95+ countries and available in 20 languages.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP, MySQL database setup and web server configuration.

name: Sympa
description: Sympa is an open source electronic mailing list manager that automates list management functions like subscriptions, moderation, and archives. Optimized for large lists with efficient message delivery.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of Perl environment and mail server configuration.

name: bewCloud
description: bewCloud is a file sharing and synchronization platform that combines file storage with notes and photo management. It serves as an alternative to Nextcloud and ownCloud with additional RSS reader functionality for a complete personal cloud experience.

deployment.justification: Docker-based deployment with simple configuration and minimal setup requirements.

features.name: Focus
features.value: Personal cloud with file sync, notes, and photos

name: Kinto
description: Kinto is a minimalist JSON storage service with synchronization and sharing abilities. It provides a lightweight, schema-less storage solution with built-in synchronization capabilities, making it ideal for applications that need simple data storage and sync.

deployment.justification: Simple Python application with minimal dependencies and straightforward configuration.

name: Nextcloud
description: Nextcloud is a comprehensive file hosting and collaboration platform that allows you to access and share your files, calendars, contacts, mail and more from any device, on your terms. It provides a secure, private cloud solution with extensive app ecosystem.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup (Apache/Nginx) and database configuration, but has good documentation and multiple installation methods.

name: OpenSSH SFTP Server
description: OpenSSH SFTP server is a secure file transfer protocol implementation that provides encrypted file transfer capabilities over SSH. It offers a reliable, standardized method for secure file transfer and remote file system access with strong authentication and encryption.

deployment.justification: Built into most Unix-like systems, simple configuration, and well-documented setup process.

features.name: Target Use Case
features.value: Secure file transfer and remote access

name: ownCloud
description: ownCloud is an all-in-one solution for saving, synchronizing, viewing, editing and sharing files, calendars, address books and more. It provides a secure, private cloud platform with enterprise features and extensive customization options.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup and database configuration, but provides good documentation and multiple deployment options including Docker.

name: Peergos
description: Peergos is a secure and private space online where you can store, share and view your photos, videos, music and documents. It also includes a calendar, news feed, task lists, chat and email client, providing a comprehensive private cloud platform with end-to-end encryption.

deployment.justification: Java-based application with good documentation, but requires understanding of cryptographic concepts and network configuration.

name: Puter
description: Puter is a web-based operating system designed to be feature-rich, exceptionally fast, and highly extensible. It provides a complete desktop environment in the browser with file management, applications, and cloud storage capabilities, offering a unique approach to web-based computing.

deployment.justification: Node.js application with Docker support, but requires proper configuration for web-based OS features and security considerations.

name: Pydio
description: Pydio (now Pydio Cells) transforms any web server into a powerful file management system and an alternative to mainstream cloud storage providers. It offers enterprise-grade security, collaboration features, and extensive customization options.

deployment.justification: Modern microservices architecture with good documentation, but requires understanding of distributed systems and proper configuration.

name: Samba
description: Samba is the standard Windows interoperability suite of programs for Linux and Unix. It provides secure, stable and fast file and print services for all clients using the SMB/CIFS protocol, enabling seamless integration between Windows and Unix-like systems.

deployment.justification: Requires understanding of SMB/CIFS protocols and Windows networking concepts, but has extensive documentation and community support.

name: Seafile
description: Seafile is a file hosting and sharing solution primarily designed for teams and organizations. It provides reliable file synchronization, sharing, and collaboration features with strong security and performance optimizations for enterprise use.

deployment.justification: Requires multiple components setup (server, database, web server) but provides good documentation and Docker support.

name: Syncthing
description: Syncthing is an open-source peer-to-peer file synchronization tool that keeps your files synchronized between multiple devices without requiring a central server. It provides secure, private, and decentralized file sync with end-to-end encryption.

deployment.justification: Simple installation with pre-built binaries, minimal configuration required, and intuitive web interface.

features.name: Target Use Case
features.value: Personal and small team file sync

name: Unison
description: Unison is a file-synchronization tool for OSX, Unix, and Windows that allows two replicas of a collection of files and directories to be stored on different hosts and synchronized by detecting changes and propagating them in either direction.

deployment.justification: Command-line tool with straightforward installation, but requires understanding of synchronization concepts and proper configuration for complex scenarios.

features.name: Target Use Case
features.value: Cross-platform file sync between specific locations

name: Genea
description: Genea is a serverless web application for visually building and editing family trees online. It works with standard GEDCOM genealogy data format and requires no backend server.

deployment.justification: Simple static file deployment with no server requirements

name: GeneWeb
description: GeneWeb is a robust genealogy software with a web interface that allows users to create, manage and visualize family trees. It supports GEDCOM format and can be used both offline or as a web service.

deployment.justification: Requires OCaml environment setup and configuration, but has detailed documentation.

name: Gramps Web
description: Gramps Web is a modern web application for browsing and collaboratively editing genealogical databases. It's fully interoperable with the Gramps desktop application and brings family history to the web.

deployment.justification: Requires setup of both frontend and backend components, but has detailed documentation.

name: webtrees
description: webtrees is a leading online collaborative genealogy application that works with standard GEDCOM files, offering full editing capabilities, privacy controls, and media support for photos and documents.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup and database configuration, but has detailed documentation.

name: Outline
description: Outline is a fast, collaborative knowledge base for growing teams that's beautiful, real-time collaborative, feature-packed, and markdown compatible. Built using React and Node.js, it offers a modern approach to team documentation.

deployment.justification: Requires Node.js and database setup, but has good Docker support and documentation.

name: Atsumeru
description: Atsumeru is a free self-hosted manga/comic/light novel media server with native clients for Windows, Linux, macOS, and Android, offering comprehensive library management and reading features.

deployment.justification: Requires Java setup or Docker deployment with database configuration.

name: BookLogr
description: BookLogr is a self-hosted personal book library manager that helps you organize, track, and manage your reading collection with a clean and intuitive interface.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with minimal configuration required.

name: Calibre-Web
description: Calibre-Web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing Calibre database, with OPDS support for e-readers.

deployment.justification: Docker deployment with existing Calibre database, minimal configuration needed.

name: Calibre
description: Calibre is a powerful, cross-platform e-book library management application that can view, convert, edit, and catalog e-books in most major formats, with a built-in content server.

deployment.justification: Desktop application with simple installation, optional server component.

name: Kapowarr
description: Kapowarr is a comic book library manager that automates downloading, organizing, and converting comic book issues, similar to Sonarr but designed specifically for comics.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup and configuration of download clients and indexers.

name: Kavita
description: Kavita is a fast, feature-rich, cross-platform reading server built with a focus on manga, comics, and books, offering a modern web interface with extensive metadata support.

deployment.justification: Single executable or Docker container with automatic setup and web-based configuration.

name: kiwix-serve
description: kiwix-serve is an HTTP daemon that serves offline content from ZIM files, enabling you to host Wikipedia, Project Gutenberg, and other educational content on your local network.

deployment.justification: Single binary with ZIM files, minimal configuration required.

name: Komga
description: Komga is a media server for comics, mangas, BDs, magazines and eBooks with API and OPDS support, offering a modern web interface for exploring libraries and a feature-rich web reader.

deployment.justification: Single JAR file or Docker container with automatic database setup.

name: Librum
description: Librum is a modern, feature-rich e-book reader and library manager that supports all major book formats, runs on all devices, and offers powerful tools to boost reading productivity.

deployment.justification: Desktop application with simple installation, cloud sync optional.

name: Stump
description: Stump is a fast, free and open source comics, manga and digital book server with OPDS support, built with Rust for performance and reliability.

deployment.justification: Single binary or Docker container with built-in database and web UI.

name: DockFlare
description: DockFlare simplifies Cloudflare Tunnel and Zero Trust Access policy management using Docker labels for automated configuration. It provides a web UI for service definitions and policy overrides, enabling secure access to both Docker and non-Docker applications.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup and Cloudflare API configuration but has good documentation.

name: HortusFox
description: HortusFox is a self-hosted collaborative plant management system for tracking and managing plants across multiple locations. It provides features like task management, inventory tracking, weather monitoring, and collaborative tools.

deployment.justification: Requires MariaDB database setup, but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Actual
description: Actual is a local-first personal finance tool that provides envelope budgeting capabilities with synchronization between devices, offering complete data ownership and privacy through self-hosting options.

deployment.justification: Multiple deployment options including one-click hosting, Docker, and downloadable desktop apps.

name: BigCapital
description: BigCapital is an open-source accounting and inventory software that helps businesses manage their finances, automate accounting processes, and generate intelligent financial reports for better decision-making.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has good documentation and deployment guides.

name: Bitcart
description: Bitcart is an open-source self-hosted payment processor supporting multiple cryptocurrencies including BTC, LTC, BCH, XMR, ETH, TRX, and USDT, providing merchants with a flexible and secure payment gateway solution.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has comprehensive documentation and deployment guides.

name: BTCPay Server
description: BTCPay Server is a free and open-source Bitcoin payment processor that enables direct peer-to-peer transactions without fees or intermediaries, offering enhanced privacy, security and self-hosting capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has extensive documentation and deployment guides.

name: DePay
description: DePay is an open-source payment protocol that enables direct peer-to-peer cryptocurrency payments with automatic token conversion, allowing merchants to accept any token while receiving their preferred currency.

deployment.justification: Simple JavaScript integration with comprehensive documentation and examples.

name: ExpenseOwl
description: ExpenseOwl is a simple self-hosted expense tracking system with modern monthly pie-chart visualization and cashflow showcase, focused on quick expense entry and essential tracking features.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation and minimal configuration needed.

name: ezBookkeeping
description: ezBookkeeping is a lightweight self-hosted personal bookkeeping app with a user-friendly interface for both desktop and mobile devices, featuring PWA support, multi-currency handling, and comprehensive financial tracking capabilities.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with single command setup and good documentation.

name: Fava
description: Fava is a web interface for Beancount, a double-entry bookkeeping software, offering a modern UI with features like interactive charts, account statistics, and document management.

deployment.justification: Simple Python package installation with pip and good documentation.

name: Firefly III
description: Firefly III is a self-hosted personal finance manager that helps track expenses and income, create budgets, and generate financial reports while maintaining complete data privacy and control.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup but has good documentation and multiple deployment options.

name: FOSSBilling
description: FOSSBilling is a free open-source billing and client management solution designed for web hosting businesses, offering automated invoicing, payment processing, and comprehensive client management capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup with PHP and MySQL, but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: Galette
description: Galette is a web-based membership management system for non-profit organizations, offering features like member tracking, dues collection, and customizable fields while being free and open source.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup with PHP and database, but has good documentation.

name: Ghostfolio
description: Ghostfolio is an open source wealth management software that helps track stocks, ETFs and cryptocurrencies across multiple platforms, offering portfolio insights and data-driven investment decisions.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup with PostgreSQL and Redis, but has good documentation and Docker Compose support.

name: Hyperswitch
description: Hyperswitch is an open-source payments orchestration platform that provides a single API to access multiple payment service providers, enabling seamless payment processing with comprehensive routing and management capabilities.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has comprehensive documentation and one-click deployment scripts.

name: I Hate Money
description: I Hate Money is a simple web application for shared budget management, helping groups track shared expenses, manage who bought what and when, and settle bills easily.

deployment.justification: Simple Python web app with good documentation and Docker support.

name: Invoice Ninja
description: Invoice Ninja is a powerful open-source invoicing, payment, and time-tracking platform that helps businesses manage billing, quotes, projects and expenses with extensive customization options.

deployment.justification: Requires web server setup with PHP and database, but has good documentation and multiple deployment options.

name: InvoicePlane
description: InvoicePlane is a self-hosted open source application for managing invoices, clients and payments, offering comprehensive billing and client management features for small businesses.

deployment.justification: Simple PHP application with good documentation and straightforward setup process.

name: InvoiceShelf
description: InvoiceShelf is an open-source invoicing and expense tracking platform that helps businesses create professional invoices, manage expenses, and track payments with comprehensive features.

deployment.justification: Good documentation and installation wizard, with Docker support available.

name: Kill Bill
description: Kill Bill is an open-source subscription billing and payment platform that helps businesses manage complex billing scenarios, subscriptions, and payments with extensive customization options.

deployment.justification: Complex Java application requiring significant technical expertise for deployment and configuration.

name: Lago
description: Lago is an open-source metering and usage-based billing platform that helps businesses manage complex pricing models, subscriptions, and payments with extensive customization options.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has good documentation and deployment options.

name: Maybe
description: Maybe is an open-source personal finance and wealth management platform that helps individuals track their finances, investments, and connect with financial advisors.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has good documentation and deployment options.

name: OctoBot
description: OctoBot is an open-source cryptocurrency trading robot that enables users to create, backtest and optimize custom trading strategies using technical analysis, AI, and social media signals.

deployment.justification: Requires some technical knowledge but has good documentation and multiple deployment options including Docker.

name: Ocular
description: Ocular is an open-source budgeting and expense tracking application that helps users visualize and manage their finances across multiple years with features like Sankey diagrams and detailed analytics.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation.

name: OpenBudgeteer
description: OpenBudgeteer is an open-source budgeting application based on the Bucket Budgeting Principle, inspired by YNAB and Buckets, built with .NET Core and Blazor.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation and quick start guide.

name: Receipt Wrangler
description: Receipt Wrangler is a free and open-source receipt management and splitting application with features like OCR scanning, AI data extraction, email integration, and multi-user support.

deployment.justification: Requires Docker setup but has good documentation for deployment.

name: REI3
description: REI3 is a free and open source low-code platform for building and hosting powerful business applications with full control and ownership, offering features like workflows, end-to-end encryption, and mobile support.

deployment.justification: Requires PostgreSQL database setup but has good documentation and multiple deployment options including Docker.

name: SHKeeper
description: SHKeeper is an open-source, self-hosted cryptocurrency payment processor that enables direct acceptance of multiple cryptocurrencies without fees or intermediaries.

deployment.justification: Requires Kubernetes/k3s setup but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: SolidInvoice
description: SolidInvoice is an open-source invoicing application designed to help small businesses and freelancers manage billing operations with features like client management, quotes, invoices, and online payments.

deployment.justification: Requires PHP 8.2+ and web server setup, but has good documentation and Docker support.

name: VoucherVault
description: VoucherVault is a Django web application for digitally storing and managing vouchers, coupons, loyalty cards and gift cards with features like transaction tracking, file uploads, QR codes and expiry notifications.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation and example compose files.

name: Wallos
description: Wallos is an open-source personal subscription tracker that helps you manage recurring payments and subscriptions with features like multi-currency support, notifications, and spending analytics.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation and compose files available.

name: WYGIWYH
description: WYGIWYH (What You Get Is What You Have) is an opinionated finance tracker designed for no-budget money management, featuring multi-currency support, custom transaction rules, and built-in investment tracking.

deployment.justification: Simple Docker deployment with good documentation and compose files available.

name: AdGuard Home
description: AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking, providing a user-friendly DNS server with comprehensive filtering capabilities and detailed analytics.
